verses.text: And it came to pass a \w long|strong="H7227"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had given \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* unto \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from all their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, that \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* waxed \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \add and\add* \w stricken|strong="H0935"\w* in \w age|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 23.1 \ft stricken…: Heb. come into days\f*

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add and\add* for their \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*, and for their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, and for their \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*, and for their \w officers|strong="H7860"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, I am \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \add and\add* \w stricken|strong="H0935"\w* in \w age|strong="H3117"\w*:

And ye have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* all that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto all these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of you; for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* he that hath \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* for you.

\w Behold|strong="H7200"\w*, I have \w divided|strong="H5307"\w* unto you by lot these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* that \w remain|strong="H7604"\w*, to be an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* for your \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, from \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, with all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* that I have cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*, even unto the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w westward|strong="H3996"\w*.\f + \fr 23.4 \ft westward: Heb. at the sunset\f*

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, he shall \w expel|strong="H1920"\w* them from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you, and \w drive|strong="H3423"\w* them from out of your \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*; and ye shall \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* their \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* unto you.

Be ye therefore \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w courageous|strong="H2388"\w* to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* and to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all that is \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, that ye \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* not aside therefrom \add to\add* the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* or \add to\add* the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*;

That ye \w come|strong="H0935"\w* not among these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, these that \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* among you; neither make \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* of the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, nor cause to \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \add by them\add*, neither \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them, nor \w bow|strong="H7812"\w* yourselves unto them:

But \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, as ye have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 23.8 \ft But cleave…: or, For if ye will cleave, etc\f*

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath driven \w out|strong="H3423"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* and \w strong|strong="H6099"\w*: but \add as for\add* you, no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* hath been able to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 23.9 \ft For the \+nd LORD\+nd*…: or, Then the \+nd LORD\+nd* will drive\f*

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of you shall \w chase|strong="H7291"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, he \add it is\add* that \w fighteth|strong="H3898"\w* for you, as he hath \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* you.

Take \w good|strong="H3966"\w* \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* therefore unto \w yourselves|strong="H5315"\w*, that ye \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 23.11 \ft yourselves: Heb. your souls\f*

Else if ye do in any \w wise|strong="H7725"\w* go \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w* unto the \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w* of these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \add even\add* these that \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* among you, and shall make \w marriages|strong="H2859"\w* with them, and go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto them, and they to you:

\w Know|strong="H3045"\w* for a \w certainty|strong="H3045"\w* that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \add any of\add* these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you; but they shall be \w snares|strong="H6341"\w* and \w traps|strong="H4170"\w* unto you, and \w scourges|strong="H7850"\w* in your \w sides|strong="H6654"\w*, and \w thorns|strong="H6796"\w* in your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, until ye \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* from off this \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you.

And, behold, this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* I \add am\add* \w going|strong="H1980"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: and ye \w know|strong="H3045"\w* in all your \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* and in all your \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*, that not \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* hath \w failed|strong="H5307"\w* of all the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* concerning you; all are come to \w pass|strong="H0935"\w* unto you, \add and\add* not \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* hath \w failed|strong="H5307"\w* thereof.

Therefore it shall come to pass, \add that\add* as all \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon you, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* you; so shall the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* upon you all \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w*, until he have \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* you from off this \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you.

When ye have \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you, and have \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* yourselves to them; then shall the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* be \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against you, and ye shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4120"\w* from off the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which he hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto you.
